type.description: Select the type of change that you're committing

tweak.description: A small change to settings or configuration
tweak.title: Tweaks

format.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
format.title: Formatting

refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
refactor.title: Code Refactoring

perf.description: A code change that improves performance
perf.title: Performance Improvements

tests.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
tests.title: Tests

builds.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)
builds.title: Builds

ci.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
ci.title: Continuous Integrations

chore.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
chore.title: Chores

scope.description: What is the scope of this change (e.g. component or file name)

subject.description: Write a short, imperative tense description of the change

body.description: Provide a longer description of the change

breakingBody.description: A BREAKING CHANGE commit requires a body. Please enter a longer description of the commit itself

isIssueAffected.description: Does this change affect any open issues?

issuesBody.description: If issues are closed, the commit requires a body. Please enter a longer description of the commit itself
